verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764>, Altaschith <WH516> <WH8686>, Michtam <WH4387> of David <WH1732>. Do ye indeed <WH552> speak <WH1696> <WH8762> righteousness <WH6664>, O congregation <WH482>? do ye judge <WH8199> <WH8799> uprightly <WH4339>, O ye sons <WH1121> of men <WH120> ?
Yea, in heart <WH3820> ye work <WH6466> <WH8799> wickedness <WH5766>; ye weigh <WH6424> <WH8762> the violence <WH2555> of your hands <WH3027> in the earth <WH776>.
The wicked <WH7563> are estranged <WH2114> <WH8804> from the womb <WH7358>: they go astray <WH8582> <WH8804> as soon as they be born <WH990>, speaking <WH1696> <WH8802> lies <WH3577>.
Their poison <WH2534> is like <WH1823> the poison <WH2534> of a serpent <WH5175>: they are like the deaf <WH2795> adder <WH6620> that stoppeth <WH331> <WH8686> her ear <WH241>;
Which will not hearken <WH8085> <WH8799> to the voice <WH6963> of charmers <WH3907> <WH8764>, charming <WH2266> <WH8802> <WH2267> never so wisely <WH2449> <WH8794>.
Break <WH2040> <WH8798> their teeth <WH8127>, O 'Elohim <WH430>, in their mouth <WH6310>: break out <WH5422> <WH8800> the great teeth <WH4459> of the young lions <WH3715>, O YY <WH3068>.

Let them melt away <WH3988> <WH8735> as waters <WH4325> which run continually <WH1980> <WH8691>: when he bendeth <WH1869> <WH8799> his bow to shoot his arrows <WH2671>, let them be as cut in pieces <WH4135> <WH8709>.

As a snail <WH7642> which melteth <WH8557>, let every one of them pass away <WH1980> <WH8799>: like the untimely birth <WH5309> of a woman <WH802>, that they may not see <WH2372> <WH8804> the sun <WH8121>.
Before your pots <WH5518> can feel <WH995> <WH8799> the tshofars <WH329>, he shall take them away as with a whirlwind <WH8175> <WH8799>, both living <WH2416>, and in his wrath <WH2740>.

The righteous <WH6662> shall rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799> when he seeth <WH2372> <WH8804> the vengeance <WH5359>: he shall wash <WH7364> <WH8799> his feet <WH6471> in the blood <WH1818> of the wicked <WH7563>.

So that a man <WH120> shall say <WH559> <WH8799>, Verily there is a reward <WH6529> for the righteous <WH6662>: verily he is <WH3426> a 'Elohim <WH430> that judgeth <WH8199> <WH8802> in the earth <WH776>.
